text:
Boynton Ave., east side, between Westchester Ave. and East 172nd Street, showing the Watson Mansion on the William Watson estate. The G.W. Bromley map of 1913 shows the mansion no longer to be there and its site to be occupied (1927 map) by 2-story brick dwellings.

1911.

Gift of Randall Comfort.

1204 to 1226 Boynton Ave. (from fore to background), at, adjoining and north of the N.E. corner of Westchester Ave. Also shown (left) is No. 1537-1539 Westchester Ave., at the N.W. corner of Boynton Ave.

June 1915.

James Suydam.
